if(playerHasItemAmount(275, 1)==true) {
deleteItem(275, getItemSlot(275), 1);
sendMessage(“You Have Claimed 10Mil From The Chest ~ Tim”);
addItem(995, 10000000);
}

addItem(995, 10000000);
sM(“Enjoy your reward!”);
deleteItem(275, 1);
}
break;

item.title: Error, trying to make Chest give an item... (ID=75)
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

		case 75:
			if(player.hasItem(275, 1)) {
			addItem(995, 10000000);
			deleteItem(275, 1);
			}
			break;

That’s my code… I have an error at “player.hasitem(275, 1)) {”
and it says it couldn’t find the symbol, Symbol being “Variable player”

ALSO: I get an error if i take out the extra “)” at the end, it told me to add it when i had 2 errors…

I’m probably wrong, but if you understand what i’m trying to get it to do then could you please fix my code and send me a edited fixed one? lol. Or tell me a little what to change and I’ll try to fix it myself.
(I didn’t use any tutorials)

SERVER TYPE: {317}

[right]Thank you.[/right]
